summary: Rusty Reindeer (Savage) stumbles into a support group where the Easter Bunny, Cupid, and other down-and-out holiday icons congregate.
cast: Jonathan Prince|Fred Savage|Fred Willard|Edie McClurg|John O'Hurley|Gladys Knight|Paul Rodriguez|Harland Williams|Emily Osment|Brenda Song|Cole Sprouse|Dylan Sprouse|John Ales|Andrew Block|Nicola Fordwood
title: Holidaze: The Christmas That Almost Didn't Happen
